title: Can Riot narrative just please just tell us what's up with Jax
body:
There are so many questions..

What is he?
What does he look like? (Apart from a beard, pockmarked face and being huge)
Is he affected by the void at all? 
Is he connected with the Darkin at all?
How is he immortal?
How strong is he current day Runeterra?
What are his plans?
Does he know about Zilean?
Why does he wear a mask? Is that even a mask? WHY DO HIS EYES GLOW BLUE?

Will accept any answer that doesn't involve trolls.

replies.body:
Jax is still very strong, though likely past his prime.
Jax's plan is find someone who impresses enough that he wants to mentor.
Jax knows about Zilean.
Other stuff, you'll have to ask Jax.

> [{quoted}](name=SkiptoMyLuo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ej3AF7AJ,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-10-07T18:28:58.256+0000)
>
> Jax is still very strong, though likely past his prime.
> Jax's plan is find someone who impresses enough that he wants to mentor.
> Jax knows about Zilean.
> Other stuff, you'll have to ask Jax.

Can we ask the same very general direction question about the "No lore crew"?
{{champion:85}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:26}} 
...and a handful others.
Even though by now most people suspect Riot just hasn't chosen a direction for most of the characters, any crumbs we lore freaks can get our mitts on... you know.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

I think they gave lulu a short story
Zilean was at Icathia when it fall to the Void (**Maybe**)
Zyra also got something recently
but the others. i'm not so sure

> Jax's plan is find someone who impresses enough that he wants to mentor.
Fiora then?

oh my gosh thank you so much for answering <33333333333333 im so happy

now i just have to figure out how to ask jax the rest.

> [{quoted}](name=Adder,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ej3AF7AJ,comment-id=00040003,timestamp=2019-10-08T10:11:36.744+0000)
>
> oh my gosh thank you so much for answering <33333333333333 im so happy
> 
> now i just have to figure out how to ask jax the rest.

Perhaps if you were to present him with a real weapon as a gift?

Thank you for the sincere, straight-forward answer. 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I don't know why you're so against the idea of him being a troll. Not all media trolls are ugly, dumb, stereotypical "Im angry" type of trolls. He could be a cool troll. It could also be interesting to see how desert trolls evolved drastically differently than ice trolls (trundle). 

But anyway, part of Jax's charm is his mystery element, we don't know everything about him so it's fun to guess. Tho I did LOVE Where Icathia Once Stood so more content on Jax/Icathia would be very cool

According to Riot Scathlocke, Jax was not corrupted by the Void 

> [{quoted}](name=Scathlocke,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=pIjkqAXO,comment-id=0002000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-10-18T02:19:57.647+0000)
>
> Also he wasn't transformed by the Void.
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 
> 
> (The Void is not an upgrade...)

Not affected by void
He knows about the darkin situation because he was around shurima when that happened
His plans are to collect the strongest warriors and take back Icathia
As for some of the others, watch Necrit's video, it is the closest thing we get to valid points

Honestly, he should be a - 

> Will accept any answer that doesn't involve trolls.

Hey >:(

Why not? He already has the Troll hands. What would be so wrong with him hailing from a tribe of Steppe Trolls who live in Ionia or something?
